article_title: Coronavirus is taking a toll on people’s mental health, but there are ways to cope
article_description: As the coronavirus rolls around the world  Canadians are struggling to deal with the fear and anxiety that comes with it
article_content: Millions of people in North America watched helplessly as the coronavirus epidemic rolled over first Asia and then Europe  And when that inevitable tide hit North America  fear and anxiety levels across the continent shot through the roof And as those anxie   8318 chars
